root.str: The husk of an Enforcer, rewired and rigged with additional explosives.
Cunstruction tools available for an Ant terminal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1575 rounds.
Deployable field supply terminal to resupply friendly soldiers
Wraps your Mosquito in a heavy rust trim. For TR use only.
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Lightning. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 second.
Utility Pouch has been removed from your Engineer and its cert cost refunded.
Increases the top speed of the Reaver by 12 KPH.
Your strafe speed is increased by 35%, but accelerating and decelerating while strafing takes twice as long.
Mounted underneath Bastion Fleet Carriers the bastion's commander can order these cannons to fire concussive shells upon ground targets.
NC - Pistol - Mid - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Could not disband the squad at this time.
The overclocked Malice VE94 features an incredible rate of fire that outclasses most other small arms.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
This customization adds a Hearts decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#FF40FFCF">Harmful energy emanating from the shattered warpgate bombards you.</font>
Deploys a chest-high hardlight barrier which protects from incoming fire until it expires or is destroyed. This barrier can co-exist alongside a deployed Reserve Hardlight Barrier.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership at this time.
NC: MAX Flame 01 Right: Rail: Extended Description
Increases the weapon's reload speed by 5%.
The gate shield prevents hostile vehicles from accessing your courtyard.
Improves the top speed and acceleration of the ANT.
Increases the amount of ammo carried
The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon. It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. VS use only.
Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
NC - Shared - Auto-Pistol - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Adds 3 grenades to the default magazine size.
Flash, Harasser, and Sunderer Twin Tyre tirespike cosmetics bundled together. All factions can use these items.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. VS use only.
You have already unlocked this item and will not receive another one by purchasing this bundle.
This customization adds a Grey75 decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Applies a camo to your vehicle. VS use only.
You have chosen a name that is already taken.
Nanite Systems launched the NiSGO gun optic much to the delight of designated marksmen across Auraxis. The NiSGO utilizes a triple chevron reticule with 3.4x magnification.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> A solar-powered outhouse? These were created by several of the Oshur resorts to create a sort of rustic ambiance. Apparently this one still works.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Increases the ammo dispense range to 23 meters.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Galaxy by 3KPH.
Your friend request for [*player*] has timed out.
Fortifies armor against attacks from above.
There are many types of outfits, and most are eager to take on new players and teach you how to make an impact.
<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Go forth. Extract the gifts from beneath the limbs of the large oxygen-generating biomass. Festive. Wooden. Deliver gifts to vendors in Sanctuary.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Single Use Snow Aspen Forest Camo
艾美瑞什 Brush Vehicle Camo
Support Planetside 2 by becoming a Member or this developer may starve!
Unlock enhancements for the Combat Medic's suit slot. Suit Certifications can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Bring strike aircraft to the target location at / near location and destroy ground. This is a sample mission description.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 675 rounds.
Capture five control consoles (requires DirectiveTest character flag).
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 7 seconds.
Acquire schematics from an enemy Amp Station
The Air to Air Missiles are ideal for engaging enemy aircrafts. This weapon does require a lock-on before they can be fired.
Resupply squad vehicles with the Galaxy's Ammo Dispenser on the front lines.
Deployable barrier that absorbs incoming projectiles.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> But for now, we have the Oshur excursion days from departure and the factions share a treaty will fall apart faster than you can say "Oshur" three times. Until then, continue aiding Nascent Expeditions with their final preparations.
A 4x zoom scope ideal for engaging targets at greater distances.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> So, there's a river up ahead that's a bit too deep to drive through and if you try you'll just blow up. There's a bunch of science reasons for it, I'm sure, but three lines into the info I stopped caring.
Decreases the stationary fall rate of the Mosquito by 20 KPH.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 8.
Repair graffiti-marked surfaces in an allied Containment Site
Allows for the creation of a single magrider tank in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. VS use only.
Activate to repair 25% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.
Join Combat using the Holo Table
Deploy the drone in the storm on Esamir
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 13 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 675 rounds.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 6 months. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Vanguard. NC use only.
Single Use Desert Scrub v2 Weapon Camo
Improved hover, air brake, and vertical thrust. (More effective than previous rank)
Increases experience gain by 100% for 1 day. Boost can only be used on this character.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Galaxy's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
This massive bundle contains many Nanite Systems Export series (NSX) weapons. All items usable by all factions!
The Supernova-R PC quickly reloads its high-explosive anti-tank plasma charges that carry balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. VS use only.
You place a nanite shield around you and your allies. This can sustain small arms projectiles for a short period of time, protecting allies within it.

A battle-worn sniper rifle of Terran design rests peacefully against the tree. The weapon is scored innumerably with the wielder's kill tally, and it's clear this soldier ran out of space to record. In the metallic pommel of the weapon grip you see large letters scratched into the paint: "MENTIS"
Did you know you can use heatmaps on your map filter that show you where ally and enemy activity are?
Reduce overheat damage done to the vehicle caused by firing the primary weapon while MAD or deployed into Skylance Battery mode by 30%
Earn kills or assists with a sidearm.
[*player*]'s Alarm Module: Enemies detected and attacking nearby constructs in the [*region*] region!

A hand-held terminal from the early days of the war. It's impossible to say who still has access to this network, if anyone.

This item expires at the end of the PlanetSide Legacy event.
Kill enemy vehicles while in a vehicle yourself.
The Terran Republic has taken Hvar!

The Rocklet Rifle fires munitions that auto-det on aircraft or pierce enemy ground vehicle armor. Alternate rocklet types may be loaded into the weapon.

Press Aim Down Sights to fire a rocklet barrage.
When exiting the vehicle, all occupants will now safely "bail out." Occupants will not take fall damage and will not inherit the vehicle's momentum.
The control node is in NC hands.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> I'll pass on the matchmaking. Did my ex put you up to this?
Kill enemies near the construction Staging Sites on Esamir

USE
Right-click on map to use.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Generic Asset permissions.

Deploys a terminal capable of spawning one Harasser, ANT, or Lightning.

Max 12.
2 minute duration.
Apply this helmet to your MAX. TR use only.
Increases the rotation speed of the Vanguard by 15 degrees/second.
<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> Drill has reached the end of its lifespan. We are preparing another deployment, but it will take some time. Carry on until then.
Increases turbo fuel regeneration rate. An empty fuel tank will refill completely in 27.5 seconds.
Earn this ribbon by destroying enemy fighters in air-to-air combat.
Changes color of the cockpit glass to Auraximas Green. TR use only.
Apply the single use Digital camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The Skyguard fires 40mm flak rounds that are highly effective against enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.
Apply the Pumpkin Patch camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
艾美瑞什 Forest v2 Weapon Camo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 rounds.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 50%.

Activate to override the Defector's cooling system regulators turning it into a walking bomb that explodes at the end of 12 seconds. While active, you gain 31% additional armor, lose 10% movement speed, and weapons no longer produce heat. If killed before the countdown is complete, you will be defused.
Heads up, soldier! Command wants to make sure we collect examples of the plant life that's sprung up. Snow is melting, plants and rocks glowing, all because of that broken Warpgate.
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. NC use only.
Increases the yaw rate of the Mosquito by 4 degrees/second.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.

Representative Ayla, quartermaster to those aiding in the restoration of Esamir, opens channels of communication with soldiers of Auraxis in order to prevent the storms from appearing outside of Esamir. And the empires discover that the construction of the Containment Sites may not mark the end of their troubles on Esamir.
The Festive Drone can usually be found floating around the Atrium in Sanctuary.
The New Conglomerate has taken the facility!
All sales benefit the Travis Manion Foundation. Bundle contains equivalent decals for all 3 empires. Boost can only be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 grenades.
Allows the Engineer to use the "Bouncing Betty" proximity mine.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
You can earn Mentorship Ribbons by being in squads with players under Battle Rank 30 and being nearby when they earn squad support experience. Show them the ropes!
ADD TIME SO YOU DON'T MISS YOUR NEXT...
Customize your operative's voice with this masculine sounding Greenhorn Voice Pack.
Damage from impacts striking the front of the Lightning are reduced by an additional 10%.
The Militant's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer.
Soft Point Ammunition increases the weapon's maximum damage range by 5 meters, but reduces its projectile velocity by 5%.
Damaged and depleted shields recharge sooner
Failed to change the platoon leader.
Normal fall damage now starts at 20 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 60 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Kill enemy players with the NSX Amaterasu.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 rockets.
Increases the lock on range of the missile launcher by 20 meters.
Unlock various gadgets for the ANT's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Reduces the time it takes to lock-on to a target.

CAMPAIGN STANDING
Campaign Standing is accumulated by completing events and missions related to the current campaign. Campaign Standing can be used to purchase special campaign-related items and equipment, and the currency expires at the end of the campaign.

Max 5000.
As an Infiltrator, hack an exposed console at a Vanu Sovereignty controlled Biolab. Analysis HUD will highlight the target.
Lock-on warnings while in vehicles indicate the number of incoming missiles and the source. "G" is for ground sources, "A" is for aircraft.
Press [%s] to speak with field officer
Pain Field NPC - 艾美瑞什
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, notDedGaem2020. Download currently 80% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
Applies a Crystal Camo pattern to your character. NC use only.
Tool: Rocket Launcher: NC15 Phoenix AE
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> We have yet to field test it though, and our scientists believe the best way to do that would be to send a living host into the electrical storm.
Single Use Snow Aspen Forest Camo
Apply the single use Scrub Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have just been notified that you've deployed the first buoy, good work, soldier! Our researchers are receiving the data now.
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Magrider.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 10%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.75 second.
Increases the top speed of the Prowler by 6 KPH.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 10%.
Improved hover, air brake, yaw rate and downward thrust.
艾美瑞什 Brush Weapon Camo
Speak with Representative Nalla in Sanctuary
Code-named "Recall" after a famous field operative, the U-150 offers a large, 20-round magazine with a mid-range damage profile. NSO use only.
This 4th Anniversary Edition Eridani SX5 submachine gun excels in close quarter combat situations. VS use only.
Light or dark, monsters beware. These Heavy Crossbows will send your enemies slinking back to the shadows. All factions can use these weapons.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Eye of the Sovereign Armor Decal
Adds 6 round to the default magazine size.
Adds the Rhino style hubcaps to your Flash. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Our informants tell me that our enemies also seek to reach the relic. We cannot allow this to happen, so if you see any of them at the facilities eliminate them.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Scythe to 11 minutes.
The Lightning is a light one man tank. The Lightning can be outfitted with various types of turrets allowing it to fill anti-air and anti-armor roles.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.75 second.
Vehicle Terminals are where you can create your own vehicles for your use.
Release a caustic cloud of smoke that is capable of harming soldiers in a 7.5 meter radius
Adds Hubcaps TR005 to your Flash. (DNT)
Unlock firemodes to alter your weapon with
Designed in the late 28th century for close quarters and mid-range combat scenarios, the Carnage AR features high hip fire accuracy and an adaptable attachment system. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Your efforts are acknowledged, enlightened one. And they shall be rewarded.
Sharpshooters have long preferred the Terran Marksman Scope, praising its simple 4x magnified crosshair for its versatility and efficiency.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Heya, pal. A little bird told me that you needed to get to a place you maybe shouldn't go, to do something you maybe shouldn't do, to get something that was probably hidden for a reason. I can help with that.
Celebrate the legacy of PlanetSide with this Ishundar themed bundle! This bundle contains weapons for all factions, and cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 58 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
This bundle contains two random common or uncommon implants.
Your petition has been sent to [*guild*].
Killing an enemy soldier increases cloak charge by 33%.
You have been firing on ally forces. Exercise more caution in the future.
Apply the Flame camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Could not join because the platoon invite has expired.

<font color="#00FFAA">???:</font> I suppose that this would be my third "body." First born to be a mortal archivist with the name of Dolan, then confined in an ancient Vanu artifact on Desolation, and now integrated into this mechanical husk.
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
TIP: Hack command consoles to capture facilities!
Allows the Squad Leader to place yellow smoke as a rally point.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to DarkBlue.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "0" Gold Hood Ornament.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.

Trades 50 Synthium for 5 Polystellarite.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? NC use only.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 1.
Single Use Jungle Forest Vehicle Camo
There are several different <font color="#7ff4ff">implant types</font> and many types have <font color="#7ff4ff">multiple tiers. </font>The higher the tier, the better the benefits!
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Now, when you are ready and able, please use a Warpgate terminal to reach Esamir. We have much work to do, and the clock is against us.
Unable to stream. Cannot enable streaming while recording for YouTube video.
Enemy infantry and MAX units within 2 meters of you receive 10% more damage when attacked from the rear.
Apply the single use California Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> This is the garage of the newly constructed Containment Site. Defending the facility becomes considerably more difficult when vehicles breach this location.
You wanna turn up the heat?
Kill a bounty target with a Rocket Launcher.
Any changes to vehicle equipment occur when the vehicle is next spawned
Command wants you to take the fight to the enemy and push the front lines. This war isn't going to win itself, so get to an enemy base, eliminate their forces, and secure those capture points.
We can't let this facility fall to the enemy!
Single Use Esamir Ice Armor Camo
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "R" Hood Ornament.

Now that you have Redeploy open, take note of the green waypoints. Each one of these waypoints can be used to Deploy into, made possible by the Redeploy system. Your Objective is to find the Warpgate waypoint and deploy into it. Use your mouse wheel to zoom in and out of the map.
Adds 7 rounds to the default magazine size.
Complete the objectives without dying or redeploying.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.24 seconds.
Get a selection of ANT weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price! NC only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rockets.
The owner has blocked your access to this terminal.
Adds a cosmetic attachment to your ANT. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rockets.
Adds the Hyena X Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
While riding in the exposed vehicle seat, you receive an additional 50% maximum shield health.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Usable by all factions.
You are in a restricted area!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rounds.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Scrub Armor Camo
Adds 3 grenades to the default magazine size.
Capture and hold all 3 Biolabs on Esamir
Kills with melee weapons will cloak the player for a time.

Masamune integrates contextual firemodes, allowing it to release all four rockets from the hip, or laser guide them in a burst while using the cutting edge tracking optics. All players can use NS weapons.
Reduces the duration of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you by 50%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
The bulky EM4 Longshot's overclocked propulsion coils allow for projectiles that both travel faster and hit harder in comparison to other bolt-action sniper rifles. NC use only.
Removes the movement speed penalty of Time Bomb, and reduces the movement speed penalty of Seraph Shield to 25%. In addition, you accelerate into a sprint more quickly at all times.
Sunderer, the Conquerer on the Battlefield
Doubles the amount of ammunition in each magazine, and the weapon takes 20% longer to equip and unequip.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 rounds.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
The jump key is used to hurdle battlefield obstacles, but jumping greatly reduces weapon accuracy.
Applies an Alpha Squad decal to your armor.
The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 25 meter radius for 20 seconds.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 338 rounds.
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 100%.
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.
Failed to change the platoon leader.

The Froglok were the third new playable race added to the game after launch, in the expansion The Legacy of Ykesha, on February 25 2003. This expansion was the first download-only expansion available to EverQuest, and jump started the trend we view as commonplace in online games today.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
Increased armor penetration at the expense of slightly less damage against other target types.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Your Outfit doesn't have enough members.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
TR's Light A. Baron GOLD Description
Certification points are used to unlock new weapons, abilities, and upgrades.
<font color="#00FFAA">Gunnery Officer:</font> Damage report! The aft belly component has been damaged.
Increases Charger Grenade capacity to three
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 540 seconds.
VS - Pistol - Mid - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 grenades.
Earned by the 3rd consecutive month of membership or by upgrading your membership plan
Unlocks access to Decoy Grenades for ALL classes.
The New Conglomerate has defended Zurvan!
The Colossus is a heavy tank armed with a dynamic Mammoth Cannon primary weapon and four secondary weapons for defense. In addition, the Colossus can deploy into an anti-air skylance battery.
NS35 Frag Cannon Right Gold Medal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 missiles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
Apply the Recon camo pattern to your weapon.
Unstable Ammunition significantly increases the size of projectiles fired while reducing headshot bonus damage by 80%.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.

Thanks for helping out! Please enter as much information as you can about the bug you encountered. We will automatically collect the following info at the time of bug submission: Your character name, your in-game location (zone and map location), your loadout info, your screen resolution, and your graphics quality settings.
An under barrel grenade launcher weapon attachment.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 175 rounds.

Deploys a dependable Snowman to stand watch over your base.

Only available during Auraximas.

Hey slick. SPRK-33 over here has been putting bounties out on some baddies in the field based on their performance. It's like a pastime of his or somethin', finds it really amusing. Anyway. You kill a bountied target, you get a prize. Go get 'em tiger.
Adds the Chrome Wilderness Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Built as an experimental alternative to earlier underwater rifles, the Swordfish launches aluminum flechettes at a high rate of fire. <font color="#dc9c36">Can fire while submerged.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
The LA9 Vagabond's lightweight construction allows good accuracy when fired from the hip.

Data downloaded from an Auraxis terraforming station. Contains advanced geothermal analysis of the storms on Esamir.

This item advances a campaign mission and cannot be equipped.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 31% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.

CERTIFICATIONS
Used for unlocking and upgrading skills and equipment. Experience earned will be converted to Certs.

Max 10,000 for non-Members.
Max 50,000 for Members.
Increases the amount of Cortium harvested per second by 10%.
NS35 Frag Cannon Left Silver Medal

This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 2.5 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 40 meter radius for 35 seconds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 360 seconds.
Designed as an alternative to the popular SABR-13 assault rifle, the Arbalest fires concentrated, 6-round bursts with low recoil and high takedown potential at mid-range. TR use only.
Atmospheric thruster fuel near zero. Prepare to return to orbit.
While active, a barrier forms around the ANT, absorbing incoming damage at the cost of stored Cortium.
Increases the Infiltrator's Control Console hacking speed.
